full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### SW-88925 - NPP Justice Robotic Process Automation

### Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023038-T
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM019020/23038
* **Publication Date**: June 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2023 5:00:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Contract Summary
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Solution for Justice Canada. The successful bidder will supply an RPA solution for a period of one year with the option to extend for two additional years.

#### Tendering Method
This solicitation is open only to SSC RPA Solution Standing Offer Holders who have qualified to sell the incumbent solution. Interested bidders can be found on the SSC RPA Solution Standing Offer Ecosystem.

#### Meeting Solicitation Requirements
Bidders must meet all terms and conditions outlined in the SSC RPA Solution Standing Offer. The Standing Offer Holders being invited to submit a bid include Automation Anywhere, Bits in Glass, Burnie Group, Computacenter Terramach, IPSS, and KPMG.

#### Inquiries
Any questions or concerns regarding this solicitation must be directed to the Contracting Authority, Matthew Woods, at coeaip-ceaan@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

#### Document Availability
Solicitation documents will be sent directly to qualified Standing Offer Holders who are being invited to submit a proposal. Note that Canada Buys is not responsible for distributing solicitation documents.

#### Security Level
There are no security requirements associated with this requirement.

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation may be subject to various trade agreements including the Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.
